title: Perform Pipe Stress Analysis
description: A piping engineer needs to perform a stress analysis on a high-temperature pipeline to ensure it can expand safely without failing.

tasks.description: Model the pipeline's geometry in the stress analysis software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the model of the pipeline.

tasks.description: Apply the operating temperature, pressure, and fluid weight to the model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines the load cases for the analysis.

tasks.description: Run the analysis and check the calculated stresses and pipe support loads against the allowable limits in the piping code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the analysis and confirms that all stresses and loads are within the code's allowable limits.
